page.title: 04EXAMPLES OF LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: The many{mills and terrace housing are still a major feature of the landscape, a reminder of Oldham's past. Some mills have been pulled down (Mersey, Gladstone, Argyll mills). Those not demolished have mostly been taken over by{warehouses, supermarkets or{mail order firms. Some local employers include: {Pifco -}small electrical appliances (employ 200) {Failsworth Hats}- employ (170) {Littlewoods Mail Order}- employ (130) {Astor}- Wax blenders for packaging and petroleum jelly for cosmetics - (50) {Hubron}- manufacture and distribution of rubber pellets (100). Smaller employers include Kitchen Design, Cash n Carry drinks centre, McGregor Sportswear, and many examples of workshop type industries occupying small backstreet premises.
